title.rendered: The Top Fall Activities Near Kremmling, Colorado

content.rendered:
Fall is here, and so is the latest in fall adventures  

AVA is back with some of your favorite fall adventures, take a splash on our kayak and scenic float trips located in Kremmling. If the river isn’t your thing, fear not, the town of Idaho Springs is commonly known for its rich history in the mining industry. As well as being the birthplace of the 1859 gold rush, it now fosters some of Colorado’s most exciting and thrilling adventures like the Mount Evans Via Ferrata; an aerial obstacle course that will test your bravery and endurance, or our cliffside zipline, zoom past Idaho springs beautiful scenarios making your way through the multiline course and take in the nature. 

Image courtesy thisisidahosprings.com

Take a trip down the Colorado River 

Kremmling is home to scenic and thrilling kayaking and rafting trips on the Colorado River. This class two section is just an hour from Breckenridge. It’s also a perfect river for those looking to enjoy Colorado’s beautiful mountains ranges and fun rapids. Just make sure to keep paddling.  

Idaho springs where the sky isn’t the limit 

This fall we welcome you and your family to Idaho springs to join us for two of our fan favorites, Mount Evans Via Ferrata. An aerial obstacle course located alongside Mount Evans, and the cliffside zipline is a multi line zipline course that tests your adrenaline and takes your adventure to the next level. Are you ready to take on these next-level adventures? 

AVA Rafting & Zipline strives to create the best adventure Experience. We work hard towards; making sure all guests are ready for a great time and a safe time. All Via Ferrata and Zipline  adventures provide guests with a helmet, harness, and instruction on how to proceed on the course. 

Mount Evans via Ferrata

The Via Ferrata course embarks over the Idaho Springs and Chicago creek area, fitted with a 500 feet free fall, a 70-foot rappel, and an array of suspended bridges situated 300 feet above the beautiful Chicago creek. Just don’t look down. This course has an age minimum  of 12+

Via Ferrata whats to bring

  • good shoes for the hike in
  • Comfy, athletic style pants
  • Water Bottle
  • Sunscreen
  • Backpack

Idaho springs zipline

Just like its brother, the cliffside zipline is located in the mountains of Idaho springs offers 6 lines of big drops as you zig-zag down the course. This course has an age minimum  of 6-12

Cliffside zipline what to bring 

  • good shoes for the hike in
  • Comfy, athletic style pants
  • Water Bottle
  • Sunscreen
  • Backpack

BOOK NOW !!! For Your Adventure Needs

AVA prides itself in providing all guests with a great adventure experience; From our sales team that helps you book and plan your trips to the dedicated instructors that make sure each trip is safe, fun, and memorable. You and your family should check out the many fall options that we have for this season. Get a little wet on our upper colorado float trips that take place in good ole Kremmling home of the colorado river. Join us for our end-of-the-season float trips a great way to close the season with a splash. 

Easy access to your last minute summer fun 

 –Book me today – Mount evans or Granite Via Ferrata  

 – Book me today – Upper colorado river rafting trips
